resources.string:
This app is designed for use by musicians looking to find inspiration for chord changes in their songs.

To get started, first either record yourself playing notes that you want to use, or use the slider to manually select notes. Then, when you've decided on a note, press the "&store_button;" button to save it. You can also press the "&stop_recording_button;" button to temporarily disable the microphone, then press the button again to re-enable the microphone. After storing one to three notes, press the "&chord_prog_button;" button to see common chord progressions involving the notes you've selected.

Press the ? button in the top right again to hide this menu.

This screen contains recommendation for scales and chord progressions that include the notes you selected. Press the star next to a chord progression to add it to your favorites. If you make a mistake, you can press the star again to remove it from your favorites. To view all chord progressions you\'ve favorited, press the star button in the top left corner.\n\nPress your device\'s back button to return to the previous screen, or press the ? button in the top right again to hide this menu.
No scales found with the notes you selected. Please try a different combination of notes.
No chord progressions found with the notes you selected. Please try a different combination of notes.

This screen shows the chord progressions you\'ve added to your favorites. Press the star next to a chord progression to remove it from your favorites. If you make a mistake, you can press the star again to re-add it to your favorites.\n\n Press your device\'s back button to return to the previous screen, or press the ? button in the top right again to hide this menu.
